body_html:
I have added test_no_grad_copy to test_autograd.py, which tests:

  • non-contiguous gradient is handled correctly
  • manually setting .grad to None works
  • produced .grad with same result are using different buffer
  • last one of produced .grad didn't do memcpy when no copy conditions are met
body_text:
I have added test_no_grad_copy to test_autograd.py, which tests:

non-contiguous gradient is handled correctly
manually setting .grad to None works
produced .grad with same result are using different buffer
last one of produced .grad didn't do memcpy when no copy conditions are met
body:
I have added test_no_grad_copy to test_autograd.py, which tests:
- non-contiguous gradient is handled correctly
- manually setting .grad to None works
- produced .grad with same result are using different buffer
- last one of produced .grad didn't do memcpy when no copy conditions are met
